name: G. Pumping Lemma
statement:
You are given two strings s, t of length n, m, respectively. Both
strings consist of lowercase letters of the English alphabet.Count the
triples (x, y, z) of strings such that the following conditions are
true: s = x+y+z (the symbol + represents the concatenation); t = x+
underbrace{ y+
dots+y }_{k
text{ times}} + z for some integer k.
